items.title: Alcyonite
items.description: Alcyonite is a space dedicated to crafting meaningful blogs that reveals the magic of Computer Science, where inspiration begins and creativity finds its journey
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Artism
items.description: Developing a full-stack website (https://artism.life) from scratch, integrating web development technologies such as NGINX, Express.js, MySQL. Hosted on Linode Server. The site allows users to apply and submit artworks for an annual art event
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Ascii Art
items.description: This python convert any images into an ascii art with colours, user can choose which ascii character to use
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Autonomous Rover
items.description: An internship project, building an indoor autonomous rover designed to transport items between hallways and classrooms. It can be programmed with various destination goals according to user preferences.
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Bioinformatics
items.description: To construct phylogenetic tree from protein clusters using maximum likelihood method to reveal evolutionary relationship between Saccharomyces Cerevisiae, Schizosaccharomyces Pombe and other Fungi species
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Course Scheduler
items.description: A team software engineering project that aims to improve course choosing process at Trinity Western University, to help make the user experience more intuitive, more convenient
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: My Movie With Flutter
items.description: An iOS app built for movie lovers who want to keep all their favourite films in one place. Developed using Flutter and Dart, the app offers a clean, user-friendly interface for organizing and managing your personal movie collection.
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Physical Computing Lab
items.description: Physical computing projects (using ESP32 microchip) demonstrated in a personal website
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Remedentia
items.description: Remedentia is an musical therapy app that helps patients with dementia. This team software engineering project aims to make a useful app that caregivers, or professionals can easily use to perform musical therapy to dementia patient. It can record patients' reaction, mood, etc. In addition, the caregivers can also take notes about a specific patient. The notes can be exported to PDFs
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Senior Reminder Device
items.description: This is an ultimate reminder device that mainly reminds seniors to take pills, do certain tasks, temperature, and humidity. In addition, it also has an emergency button, that once pushed, will send messages to family members or caregivers in case they need assistance
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Sieve Of Eratosthenes
items.description: Finding Primes Numbers Using Sieve of Eratosthenes Algorithm
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: Video Colourization
items.description: This python program is based on other projects I have created to colourize a black and white video using existing Machine Learning model
items.author: Linyun Liu

items.title: iMessage ChatBot
items.description: This project integrate OpenAI API, SQLite, Python to create an automated chatbot for iMessage on Mac
items.author: Linyun Liu
